Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP about a month now, well actually not so much playing as downloading mods, and experimenting with them to see which ones i want to have when I start playing, LoL. Just wanted to say hello. I don't have any questions at the moment, but thanks.

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear you've been enjoying yourself. If you do end up having any questions, feel free to ask them in the aptly-named Gameplay Sections thread.

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear you've been enjoying yourself. If you do end up having any questions, feel free to ask them in the aptly-named Gameplay Sections thread.

Unless the question is about a Mod, then it goes in the General Add-on Affairs section (Or that mods thread)
Welcome aboard! There's always a healthy collection of mods to try out. I hope to see ya in space real soon!
Thanks for the tips y'all. Yeah, there is a lot of mods for sure, just trying to figure out the ones i want the most while keeping my fps at a decent level.
